mapper.update: UPDATE mk_community_article SET collect_num = collect_num + 1 WHERE id = ${articleId}
UPDATE mk_community_article SET praise_num = praise_num + 1 WHERE id = ${articleId}
UPDATE mk_community_article SET collect_num = collect_num - 1 WHERE id = ${articleId}
UPDATE mk_community_article SET praise_num = praise_num - 1 WHERE id = ${articleId}
mapper.sql: SELECT a.*, c.title category_title, u.nickname, IF(f.state = 0, f.path, NULL) avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mk_community_comment WHERE root_id = a.id) comment_num FROM mk_community_article a LEFT JOIN mk_community_category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN mk_user u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN mk_file f ON u.avatar = f.id
mapper.select: WHERE a.category_id = ${categoryId} ORDER BY IF(${type} = 1, a.create_time, a.update_time) DESC
WHERE a.user_id = ${userId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(af.create_time, '%Y-%m') `year_month` FROM mk_community_article_file af LEFT JOIN mk_file f ON af.file_id = f.id WHERE f.user_id = ${userId} AND f.state = 0 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(af.create_time, '%Y-%m')

SELECT a.*, c.title category_title, u.nickname, IF(f.state = 0, f.path, NULL) avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mk_community_comment WHERE root_id = a.id) comment_num FROM mk_community_article a LEFT JOIN mk_community_category c ON a.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN mk_user u ON a.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN mk_file f ON u.avatar = f.id WHERE a.id = ${articleId}
SELECT * FROM mk_community_article WHERE user_id = ${userId} AND id = ${articleId}
